faqs.question: What documentation is required to purchase as a foreigner?

Professional legal representation through a qualified Spanish property lawyer is essential, costing approximately 1-2% of purchase price. The established international community in Algorfa means numerous lawyers specialize in expatriate property transactions. Complete due diligence includes property registry verification, tax compliance, and municipal licensing confirmation—standard practice protecting buyer interests.
